TableContextTimeStampBeforeTable: {121345=Zip codes: 12833, 12866., 26590=Incorporated in 1826, 7640=According to our research of New York and other state lists there were 22 registered sex offenders living in Saratoga Springs, New York as of July 31, 2015. The ratio of number of residents in Saratoga Springs to the number of sex offenders is 1,225 to 1. The number of registered sex offenders compared to the number of residents in this city is near the state average.}
